contents: Article 18 (Chairman) ① The chairman shall be the chairman of the general meeting. However, when the Chairman is unable to perform his duties due to unavoidable reasons, the Vice-Chairman becomes the Chairman in accordance with the order established by the Chairman when appointing the Vice-Chairman. ② In the case of a general meeting convened pursuant to Article 17, Paragraph 3, the senior member and auditor among the directors, delegates, and auditors who requested the convening of the general meeting (if multiple auditors convene the general meeting jointly) shall have the authority to convene the general meeting, and the delegates present shall It is presided over by the senior member and elects a chairman from among the delegates present. Revised 2018. 4. 2., 2021. 7. 5.
